tasks.name: RSS & API
tasks.brief: Build in ability to add RSS feeds from national news sources to the news/event scraper. Also take a look at scraping event feeds from Facebook, Meetup, and Eventbrite

tasks.name: Website Makeover & Organization
tasks.brief: Work with Zian to modify website, ensuring common look and feel with branding. Also, work with Thien-Nam and others create a plan for the upcoming content surge

tasks.name: Read/Review "The Price of Philanthropy"
tasks.brief: Read the book "The Price of Philanthropy", which seems very relevant to Ibis. Extract some quotes and statistics and ideally write a book review at the end.

tasks.name: Network and Research
tasks.brief: Reach out to contacts among UNM Econ professors to gage interest. Meanwhile, do some research to get more familiar with the nonprofit industry as a whole

tasks.name: Read/Review "Just Giving" & "Radical Markets"
tasks.brief: Read the book "Just Giving", which seems very relevant to Ibis. Extract some quotes and statistics from this book and ideally write a book review at the end. Triage "Radical Markets", which may or may not be relevant.

tasks.name: Finish Path Appears
tasks.brief: Finish the book "A Path Appears", which is a good overview of the global world of social impact. This will also be a useful source to mine some initial quotes and statistics for social media

tasks.name: Newsletter Aggregation
tasks.brief: Obtain an initial list of local nonprofit news letters from the United Way grantees list. We will use this list to create a strategy for integrating local newsletters into the app

tasks.name: Website Makeover, News & Event Wireframes
tasks.brief: Correspond with (primary) Daniel to enforce common look and feel. Seperately, create a wireframe for single News page and a single Event page
